column1: Alphabetical sorting of attribute options in the rule engine
column2: Alphabetical sorting of attribute options in the rule engine

column1: If enabled, will forcefully sort select and multiselect attributes' option labels alphabetically when displaying them in the rule engine used by Optimizers and Virtual Categories. Useful if you have product attributes with very long list of options.
column2: If enabled, will forcefully sort select and multiselect attributes' option labels alphabetically when displaying them in the rule engine used by Optimizers and Virtual Categories. Useful if you have product attributes with very long list of options.
